channel.title: Now who wants to log 2! yes 2! player or more into the same WORLD!
channel.description: ok guys this is true, i have found a file that u delete and u can log 2 or more players into the same world :D now, ive made it so that at the click of a button the temporary file gets deleted and u can now go back into the world :D so what happens is, u log into a world, the temp file gets installed, then when u go out of a wold it gets reset:D but if u delete it when there is already a account logged in a world then u delete it, u can now have 2 players in the same world, ect, ect, ect this is in beta testing kk wont be long kk:D

item.title: Now who wants to log 2! yes 2! player or more into the same WORLD!
item.dc:creator: @crashe crashe
item.description:
@crashe wrote:

Alrighty, bud. I’ve got a much, MUCH easier method than this, but not too sure on how easy it is to detect…

Whatchya do is:

1)Open up your RS windows… x2 (open two of them)
2)Choose the same world for both of them
3)Go ahead and type in your name and password on both windows
4)Now, position one window on top, so as to have both of the “log in” buttons near each other and visible.
5)Click the first window’s button, then quickly do the second one’s, and VOILA!

If at first step 5 doesn’t work, then you’re not clicking fast enough… I’ll get a pic up of it in a sec…

EDIT Didn’t take a pic of two of my accounts at once… I did take a pic of me on mine and a friends account fighting one another… haha I won btw

Read full topic
item.source: Now who wants to log 2! yes 2! player or more into the same WORLD!

item.title: Now who wants to log 2! yes 2! player or more into the same WORLD!
item.dc:creator: @Alex_Owns Alex Owns
item.description:
@Alex_Owns wrote:

Open up the .dat file in notepad, delete whats in there, put random text, save it, and make it read-only, so you can infinitely multi log in.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

dewaka:

ok guys this is true, i have found a file that u delete and u can log 2 or more players into the same world now, ive made it so that at the click of a button the temporary file gets deleted and u can now go back into the world so what happens is, u log into a world, the temp file gets installed, then when u go out of a wold it gets reset:D but if u delete it when there is already a account logged in a world then u delete it, u can now have 2 players in the same world, ect, ect, ect this is in beta testing kk wont be long kk:D

So…What’s the file? And what’s the point of multi? It laggs ya.

[quote=“Asm, post:2, topic:11391”]don’t you mean .file_store_32\uid.dat ?
It was well-known way to multilog in
But now jagex may have more traps so you’re risk to get banned[/quote]
Lol, good point! At least someone thinks

Read full topic
